actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the credit for the purchase of a new principal residence for an additional year.

summary.text: Extends for an additional year the income tax credit allowed under the Internal Revenue Code for the purchase of a new principal residence.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to extend the credit for the purchase of a new principal residence for an additional year.
